    • Method Detail

      • update

        public int update()
        According the user id, update or insert: if id is -1, insert user if id is greater than 0, update user
        Returns:
        int: 1 if has been updated or inserted, 0 if didn't work, -1 if error

      • defuse

        public int defuse()
        According the user id, deactivate that user (cant use that user)
        Returns:
        int: 1 if the artist has been deactivated, 0 if didn't work, -1 if error
